org.apache.gora.util

Class IOUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.gora.util.IOUtils

  • public class IOUtils
extends Object
    An utility class for I/O related functionality.

        public static <T> void serialize(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                 DataOutput out,
                                 T obj,
                                 Class<T> objClass)
                          throws IOException
        Serializes the object to the given data output using available Hadoop serializations.
        Type Parameters:
        T - class type of object to be serialized.
        Parameters:
        conf - Hadoop conf.
        obj - object instance to be serialized.
        out - data stream which serialized content is written.
        objClass - Class type of the object to be serialized.
        Throws:
        IOException - occurred while serializing the object to bytes.

      • deserialize

        public static <T> T deserialize(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                DataInput in,
                                T obj,
                                String objClass)
                         throws IOException,
                                ClassNotFoundException
        Deserializes the object in the given data input using available Hadoop serializations.
        Type Parameters:
        T - object class type.
        Parameters:
        conf - Hadoop conf.
        in - data input stream where serialized content is read.
        obj - data object.
        objClass - object class type as String.
        Returns:
        deserialized object.
        Throws:
        IOException - occurred while deserializing the byte content.
        ClassNotFoundException - class definition cannot be found for given class name.

      • writeNullFieldsInfo

        public static void writeNullFieldsInfo(DataOutput out,
                                       Object... fields)
                                throws IOException
        Writes a byte[] to the output, representing whether each given field is null or not. A Vint and ceil( fields.length / 8 ) bytes are written to the output.
        Parameters:
        out - the output to write to.
        fields - the fields to check for null. @see #readNullFieldsInfo(DataInput).
        Throws:
        IOException - when writing the data to the stream.

      • readNullFieldsInfo

        public static boolean[] readNullFieldsInfo(DataInput in)
                                    throws IOException
        Reads the data written by writeNullFieldsInfo(DataOutput, Object...) and returns a boolean array representing whether each field is null or not.
        Parameters:
        in - the input to read from.
        Returns:
        a boolean[] representing whether each field is null or not.
        Throws:
        IOException - when value is too long to fit in integer.

      • writeBoolArray

        public static void writeBoolArray(DataOutput out,
                                  boolean[] boolArray)
                           throws IOException
        Writes a boolean[] to the output.
        Parameters:
        out - the output to write to.
        boolArray - boolean array.
        Throws:

                                    String[] arr)
                             throws IOException
        Writes the String array to the given DataOutput.
        Parameters:
        out - the data output to write to.
        arr - the array to write. @see #readStringArray(DataInput).
        Throws:

      • readStringArray

                                throws IOException

        Parameters:
        in - the data input to read from.
        Returns:
        read String[].
        Throws:
        IOException - when failed reading the data from stream.

      • storeToConf

        public static <T> void storeToConf(T obj,
                                   org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                   String dataKey)
                            throws IOException
        Stores the given object in the configuration under the given dataKey.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the given object class type.
        Parameters:
        obj - the object to store.
        conf - the configuration to store the object into.
        dataKey - the key to store the data.
        Throws:
        IOException - when failed storing the given data in Hadoop conf.

      • loadFromConf

        public static <T> T loadFromConf(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                 String dataKey)
                          throws IOException
        Loads the object stored by storeToConf(Object, Configuration, String) method from the configuration under the given dataKey.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the given object class type.
        Parameters:
        conf - the configuration to read from.
        dataKey - the key to get the data from.
        Returns:
        the store object.
        Throws:
        IOException - when failed retrieving the data given key from Hadoop conf.

      • getAsBytes

        public static byte[] getAsBytes(List<ByteBuffer> buffers)
        Copies the contents of the buffers into a single byte[].
        Parameters:
        buffers - input buffers to be merged.
        Returns:
        merged byte array.

      • readFully

        public static byte[] readFully(InputStream in)
                        throws IOException
        Reads until the end of the input stream, and returns the contents as a byte[].
        Parameters:
        in - input stream where the data is read.
        Returns:
        byte array of read data from the stream.
        Throws:
        IOException - when failed reading the data from input stream.
